thread.title: Jack Dorsey appointed permanent CEO of Twitter
thread.title_full: Jack Dorsey appointed permanent CEO of Twitter

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Jack Dorsey appointed permanent CEO of Twitter
text:
San Francisco
Twitter Inc has named co-founder and interim chief executive Jack Dorsey as its permanent CEO, ending months of speculation about who would take the reins at the company. Reuters New Delhi
HDFC slashes lending rate by 0.25% HDFC on Monday cut benchmark lending rate on housing loans by 0.25% to 9.65%, a move which will lower the EMI for borrowers. The effective home loan rate for new customers would be 9.65%, while for women borrowers, it would be 9.6%, HDFC said. PTI New Delhi
Jet Airways cuts fares by up to 30% on foreign routes Jet Airways on Monday slashed its business and economy class fares by up to 30% across its global destinations, including those in the US and Europe, for a limited period. Bookings under the six-day festive sale offer commence on Monday for the travel from October 5 and onwards, it said. PTI
